response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a highly valuable product that holds immense significance for us. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, I believe it's an asset that could greatly benefit your endeavors. I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $900,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a valuable item at a discount, and I trust it aligns well with your financial planning and strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 900000}
